experience: You and Matt both know Steven Aldrich, Russell P Reeder, and 102 others

Description:  This role is responsible for achieving monthly revenue targets across multiple Live Chat sales and support teams. Our Chat team enhances our customers experience through live interactions from the front of the site, and our help pages, to provide world class service and sales. I’m proud to work with this team as we continue to pioneer changes for our customer’s channel of choice for support.•	Customer Excellence: Customer satisfaction and Net Promoter scores have doubled since we took over this team. The staff productivity has increased by 75%, while maintaining a better than standard SLA •	Service Delivery: Manage relationship with vendor partners, as well as BPO relationships. Implemented customer facing, internal, and partner chat platforms with team of PM’s and Developers. Help implement Future Leaders program to build career path for all employees. •	Sales Attainment: Grew department in 24 months to over 500 team members globally, and achieved unprecedented jump in revenue of over 2000%•	Technology Implementation: Provided oversight for RFP process to evaluate the chat platform that would deliver the highest ROI for the company. Negotiated terms of agreement to obtain the best financial outcome. Continuously evaluated opportunities, and adjusted to market conditions and needs. •	Training: Responsible for hiring and motivating top talent across the organization including Directors, Managers, Supervisors, Coaches, and front line agents. Helping to implement Future Leaders/Mentoring program to build career path for all employees.•	Career: Managed multiple teams in the organization since starting including Inbound, Outbound, Hosting, Billing, Multi-language, Reseller, Online Support and Chat. Started leadership journey as a Supervisor in Inbound and Outbound before moving to Manager, Director, then Senior Director.

Description:  This role was responsible for managing our small business in high performance automotive specialty services, such as superchargers, turbos, exhaust systems, and custom computer tuning.•	Sales Management: Oversaw all company sales, marketing, web design and operations. Responsible for customer acquisition, referral program, and customer enthusiasm. Grew company revenue by 50% in first year, and an additional 35% in year two. •	Process Improvement Collected and analyzed data to determine costs of business activity, such as material purchases, inventory and competitive labor rates. Monitored operations to ensure that services rendered conformed to company policy and standards. Lower operations cost by 15% through enhanced scheduling and customer engagement. •	Training:  Hired and assisted in training all new employees, while ensuring safety measures, and quality control standards, were consistently exceeded. Achieved 100% rating on all OSHA inspections. •	Accomplishments:  Directed and coordinated activities of staff engaged in installing and diagnosing various performance products. Received award at Sema 2007 for Top Innovative Drag Car. Starred, with staff, on Speed Channels “Pass Time” TV show. Helped facilitate owners opportunity to star in Speed Channels TV shows “Pinks” and “Pinks All Out.”

•	General Management: Oversaw sales, installation, and customer service of car and truck accessory department for largest Chevrolet dealer in the country. Increase customer satisfaction scores in the Parts Department with implementation of Customer Call Back Program. •	Sales Management:  Increased sales revenue and gross profit by 400% in less than a year. Negotiated volume discounts with all vendors, while maintaining sales reward program to help drive auto sales with pre-loaded cars and trucks from our department. •	Marketing / Product Development: Managed all work order, purchase order and sales order documentation in support of on time delivery and inventory accuracy. Collaborated with management colleagues to implement sales and customer service strategies aimed at increasing customer satisfaction.

Katie and I worked together directly for almost 3 years. In this time, she continuously exemplified leadership, the ability to build amazing teams and dedication to her direct reports, peers and managers. In her role as a Supervisor for multiple teams, she embodied her own core values, as well as the companies, to master the art of leading by example while driving her teams to achieve amazing results. Katie makes working with her fun! She is always innovating, champions change and builds a culture that others try to emulate. She does this by collaborating with team members to ensure she is cultivating an open, inviting environment for all. Working with Katie has been a pleasure, and I have nothing but optimism for her future endeavors.
